About us

About Us

With the help of venueBooking you can book a venue for of your favourite Conferences / Exhibitions / Workshops / Weddings..

What is venueBooking:

Venuebookingz.com is venue discovering, promotion, management platform. It recommends venues for your events (Conferences, Exhibitions, Workshops, etc.) based on your occasion, capacity, budget, amenities and city.

Why venueBooking?

venueBooking generates thousands of visits that bring you business leads.

The website enables you to

  • Reach your event organizers / planner / management companies in multiple ways.
  • Promote your venue in multiple sections of the website, namely.
  • Venue listing page
  • City Page
  • Venue page
  • Connect with event organizers / planner / management companies, venue owners, event suppliers/vendors and other stakeholder before, during and after the event.
  • Put together your social tools like Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, Slideshare etc.

How to make most of it:

Make your venue a popular and get more buiness leads by using venueBooking for

  • Managing the venue listing
  • Promoting the venue
  • We create a trust
